comments:
I20051130-1215

Import org.eclipse.ui.ide as source or binary plug-in. Open the plugin.xml, go to the Extension Points page, and open the context menu on 'markerSupport' in the list. The 'Open Schema' action throws the NPE below. Clicking on the 'Schema:' link opens a wizard to create a new schema file.

In my opinion, the schema files should be available in the imported plug-in. Otherwise, the extension point definitions are not very useful.
Still, the plugin.xml editor should not throw an NPE if they're not available.

Fixed.

We will now locate the schema for the imported plug-in in the source extension on disk where it is located and we will open it.
